item.title: CVE-2021-34634|2024-08-04T00:19:47.781Z -- solaplugins -- nifty%20newsletters
item.description: The Nifty Newsletters WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the sola_nl_wp_head function found in the ~/sola-newsletters.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 4.0.23.
